text: Erdal Tosun (9 April 1963 – 30 November 2016) was a Turkish actor. After graduating from Mimar Sinan Fine Arts University, he started acting on stage and then he focused on television, acting in the show Bir Demet Tiyatro. He also starred in the films Mine, G.O.R.A., Magic Carpet Ride and Vizontele. Tosun died in a car accident in Istanbul on 30 November 2016, aged 53. He was buried at Zincirlikuyu Cemetery next to his father Necdet Tosun, and his younger brother Gürdal Tosun, who were also actors. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish television actors Category:Turkish stage actors Category:Actors from Istanbul Category:Road accident deaths
title: Erdal Tosun
